Description: Limestone offering-table inscribed with a dedication to Amenhotep I and Ahmose-Nefertari.
Curator's comments: Published Kitchen, Ram. Insc. Vol 3 p785 Published: HTBM Part 8: Plate XLVIII PM I Part 2: p.744 Holzl, R, HAB: Agyptische Opfertafeln und Kultbecken, p.83
Bibliographic references: Edwards 1939 / Hieroglyphic Texts from Egyptian Stelae e.t.c. in the British Museum (pl.48)
